SmartBillions.betOf (/unique_chucks/8/0x00f90986cdd79744409f8a3c7747064afa4473b5.sol#521-546) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (player.value == 0) || (player.blockNum <= 1) || (block.number < player.blockNum) || (block.number >= player.blockNum + (10 * hashesSize))
	- hash == 0x1000000
